620090.name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Adventure #02 - Web of the Spider Cult (Savage Worlds)
620090.description:
Daring Tales of Adventure #02 - Web of the Spider Cult
New from our Ace writer Wiggy comes this exciting adventure!
When you find a dead body in your house, especially one which belongs to a notable
explorer, you know its not going to be an ordinary day. Web of the Spider Cult
takes the heroes from the corridors and galleries of the Boston Museum, to the bayou
of Louisiana, and onto the dark jungles of Mexico. There, amid the ruins of a centuries
old temple, the adventurers face their greatest enemy so far in their extraordinary
adventures.
As well as a complete adventure designed for four characters (don't forget you can
download our cool pregens at which means you can get into
the action quicker!), Daring Tales of Adventure #02: Web of the Spider Cultalso includes a special appendix for the GM. Delving into cults and evil organizations,
the appendix provides a quick organization generator, allowing the GM to determine
the origin of the cult, its motive and methods, its leaders and their henchmen,
and their lairs with a just a few rolls of the dice.
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Grounds II virtual
tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles and images. These can
be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed. The Savage Worlds ruleset
and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens G Meyer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
